author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I do a distro review of Wubuntu, a Windows-like distro that was rebranded from LinuxFX and is likely breaking multiple copyright trademarks from both Microsoft and Canonical.

Blogposts about the LinuxFX security incidents
https://kernal.eu/posts/linuxfx/
https://kernal.eu/posts/linuxfx-part-2/

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

title: Wubuntu - An Illegal Windows Like Distro
